analysis.description:
GainCryptoV1.getBalance (/unique_chucks/15/0xdffb5ea98d788c18ad0e8d5db0ab35f37e413224.sol#157-180) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- balancesum <= maxpayout (/unique_chucks/15/0xdffb5ea98d788c18ad0e8d5db0ab35f37e413224.sol#169-180)

GainCryptoV1.withdraw (/unique_chucks/15/0xdffb5ea98d788c18ad0e8d5db0ab35f37e413224.sol#180-204) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(joined[msg.sender] > 0) (/unique_chucks/15/0xdffb5ea98d788c18ad0e8d5db0ab35f37e413224.sol#182)
